verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* prayer \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w inside|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fish|strong="H1709"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* said,

\w In|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* trouble \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* crying \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* gave \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w an|strong="H3068"\w* answer; \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* deepest underworld \w I|strong="H3068"\w* sent \w up|strong="H3124"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* cry, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H0413"\w* gave ear \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* voice.

\w For|strong="H7121"\w* \w you|strong="H0413"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* put \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w down|strong="H7121"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* deep, \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w heart|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* sea; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* river \w was|strong="H3068"\w* round \w about|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*; all \w your|strong="H3068"\w* waves \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* rolling waters \w went|strong="H0413"\w* \w over|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3220"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* said, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w been|strong="H3605"\w* sent \w away|strong="H7993"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* eyes; how \w may|strong="H3824"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* ever again see \w your|strong="H3605"\w* holy Temple?

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* waters \w were|strong="H5869"\w* circling round \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w even|strong="H3254"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* neck; \w the|strong="H0559"\w* deep \w was|strong="H0559"\w* \w about|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*; \w the|strong="H0559"\w* sea-grass \w was|strong="H0559"\w* twisted round \w my|strong="H5048"\w* head.

\w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w went|strong="H5437"\w* \w down|strong="H5437"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* bases \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* mountains; \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w for|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* earth, \w her|strong="H5704"\w* walls \w were|strong="H4325"\w* \w about|strong="H5437"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w for|strong="H4325"\w* ever: \w but|strong="H4325"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H4325"\w* \w taken|strong="H5437"\w* \w up|strong="H5704"\w* \w my|strong="H5704"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* underworld, \w O|strong="H5315"\w* Lord \w my|strong="H5704"\w* God.

\w When|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w me|strong="H1157"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* overcome, \w I|strong="H0776"\w* kept \w the|strong="H3068"\w* memory \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* prayer \w came|strong="H5927"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w you|strong="H3381"\w*, \w into|strong="H0776"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* holy Temple.
\w The|strong="H0853"\w* worshippers \w of|strong="H3068"\w* false gods \w have|strong="H3068"\w* given \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* only hope.

\w But|strong="H5800"\w* I \w will|strong="H1892"\w* make \w an|strong="H8104"\w* offering \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w you|strong="H8104"\w* with \w the|strong="H8104"\w* voice \w of|strong="H1892"\w* praise; I \w will|strong="H1892"\w* \w give|strong="H8104"\w* effect \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* oaths. Salvation is \w the|strong="H8104"\w* Lord's.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Lord's order, \w the|strong="H0834"\w* fish sent Jonah out \w of|strong="H3068"\w* its mouth \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* dry land.
